titles.title: Military Toy Replica Act
Military Toy Replica Act
To prohibit defense contractors from requiring licenses or fees for use of military likenesses and designations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Readiness.

bill.summary: Military Toy Replica Act - Directs the Secretary of Defense to require that any contract entered into or renewed by the Department of Defense include a provision prohibiting the contractor from requiring toy and hobby manufacturers, distributors, or merchants to obtain licenses from, or pay fees to, the contractor for the use of military likenesses or designations on items provided under the contract.
